Package es.uma.ada.problem.algebra.diophantine.pythagorean

package es.uma.ada.problem.algebra.diophantine.pythagorean
Algorithms for finding Pythagorean triples
Version:
1.0
Author:
ccottap
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    es.uma.ada.problem.algebra.diophantine
    Classes for applications related to integers and rational numbers (factorization into primes, diophantine approximation, ...)
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    NaivePythagoreanTripleFinder
    Finds primitive Pythagorean triples by naive brute force, i.e., by considering all possible values under the limit
    PythagoreanTriple
    Pythagorean triples are sorted triples of three integers a, b, c satisfying that a2 + b2 = c2.
    PythagoreanTripleFinder
    Abstract class for algorithms finding collections of primitive (non-reducible) Pythagorean triples
    TestPythagoreanTripleFinder
    Test the algorithms for finding Pythagorean triples
